metadata.title: CVE-2020-11760 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in OpenEXR before 2.4.1. There is an out-of-boundsread during RLE uncompression in rleUncompress in ImfRle.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11760` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr24 - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1
openexr - 2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-6ubuntu0.1').
